name: Deadly brawl (Windows)
description:
Superpowers. What else do you need?

Controls:

Move with arrows

Shoot - spacebar

1st active - page down (if high enough level)

2nd active - end (if high enough level)

Ultimate (if active) - delete (if high enough level)

In challenge mode (custom made levels) you can stop time by letting in projectiles in the orange area and preferably avoiding them. It has 4 levels.

In loop mode (rogue like) level up and meet bizarre allies (3rd level is with boss, nothing new beyond).

Bosses can be tough, but are beatable, with certain weak points.

Used assets

Game engine - Godot

Audio

Juhani Junkala - The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection (CC0, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dbACpSy9FWY)

Juhani Junkala - G&T RPG soundtrack (OGA-BY 3.0, CC-BY 4.0, https://opengameart.org/content/gt-rpg-soundtrack)

Mute Colossus - TS Sounds (Extension Asset (Unity))

RGA-GT - The Best of RGA-GT Music Pack (CC-BY 4.0, https://opengameart.org/content/the-best-of-rga-gt-music-pack)

Visual

Fonts for flash - FFF forward (Free for commercial use, https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html)

HeartBeast/Heart game dev – ARPG tutorial asset pack(MIT license, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mAbG8Oi-SvQ&list=PL9FzW-m48fn2SlrW0KoLT4n5egNdX-W9a)

Plugins

impj94 - gdYAFSM Finite State Machine (MIT)
